title: 法律界可做d野盡幫義士

replies.msg:
Sorry我打中文太慢, 但有當軍(United Nations peace keeping) experience 的 military大狀話要d猛d既counsel in Court. 比d magistrate heavy weight representing 義士raise questions like:
(To Police officer in Court )"Where were you? were you wearing a badge? Did you show your
warrant? What is the SOP (Standard Operaing Procedure? What is your ROE
(Rule of Engagement)?
主要是Kick up enough shit legally to establish ***arrest is UNLAWFUL!***
= 義士 cannot be charged if arrest is deemed illegal
Point out clearly in Court if there is any mistreatment or rules not followed in custody.
***Also need heavy weight SC to go to High Court and inundate with loads of Habeas Corpus applications to get people freed.
Just a few thoughts.....天有眼天佑義士
聽日930東區法院
